cds::memory::michael::opt::sizeclass_selector< TYPE > Struct Template Reference

Option setter specifies size-class selector. More...

#include <cds/memory/michael/options.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
struct cds::memory::michael::opt::sizeclass_selector< TYPE >

Option setter specifies size-class selector.

The size-class selector determines the best size-class for requested block size, i.e. it specifies allocation granularity. In fact, it selects superblock descriptor within processor heap.

Available TYPE implementation:

  • default_sizeclass_selector
